recordTypes.name: 1. Signing Up, Creating a Profile & Accessing Your Information
recordTypes.description: Instructions on signing up for a OpenGov Citizen Services Cloud Account and how to access your profile and records.

recordTypes.name: 2. Applying for a Permit & Paying Fees
recordTypes.description: How to apply for a permit and pay any fees that are due.

recordTypes.name: Stonington Commercial Building Permit Application
recordTypes.description: This application is designated for commercial projects.

recordTypes.name: 3. Receiving Your Permit or Other Document
recordTypes.description: How to view and print your issued permit, license, or other issued document.

recordTypes.name: Sewer Permit
recordTypes.description: Sanitary Sewer Permits are required for all activities performed on the sanitary sewer system, whether located within Town-owned property or within private property on the exterior of the building. These activities include the installation or repair of a private sanitary sewer house connection, street sewer, sewer trunk line, or any other activity involving the sanitary sewer system.

recordTypes.name: Stonington Tent Permit
recordTypes.description: This application is designated for temporary tents

recordTypes.name: Stonington Residential Building Permit Application
recordTypes.description: This Permit is for Residential Single Family Homes, two Family Homes or Townhouses as defined by the CT State Building code Renovations, Additions and Alterations.

recordTypes.name: Stonington Demolition Permit Application
recordTypes.description: This permit is for the demolition of any building being removed from a property. Commercial or Residential.

recordTypes.name: Stonington Generator Permit
recordTypes.description: Used when installing a manual or automatic generator set.

recordTypes.name: Stonington Tank and/or Piping Installation Permit
recordTypes.description: Used when installing Gas Lines and/or Tanks that hold Liquid Propane, Natural Gas or Fuel Oil.

recordTypes.name: Stonington Electrical Permit
recordTypes.description: THIS APPLICATION IS NOT FOR SOLAR!!

recordTypes.name: Stonington Plumbing Permit
recordTypes.description: Used when installing all types of plumbing and sprinkler systems.

recordTypes.name: Stonington Heating & Cooling Permit
recordTypes.description: This permit is for HVAC and associated work.

recordTypes.name: Stonington Roof/Window(s)/Door(s)/All types of Exterior Siding. Commercial and Residential.
recordTypes.description: This permit is for installation of roof(s), window(s) and vinyl siding and associated work only.

recordTypes.name: Stonington Swimming Pool Permit
recordTypes.description: This application is for the installation of any structure intended for swimming or recreational bathing that contains water more than 24 inches deep. A swimming pool is defined as any pool 2' in height or more, blow up or metal does not matter.

recordTypes.name: Stonington Solar Permit
recordTypes.description: Solar installation. Used whether or not you have a Commercial or Residential Building Permit

recordTypes.name: Stonington Sign Permit
recordTypes.description: This permit is for any signs installed on buildings or stand alone.

recordTypes.name: Stonington Fence Permit
recordTypes.description: This permit is for any fence(s) installed stand alone on or attached to a structure.
